resources.string: Welcome to NASA Daily Image Viewer\n

Welcome to the login screen. On a fresh install, a toast message will appear. It will tell you to enter your email and a password to setup the login. Unless you reinstall, this prompt will not appear again. Enter an email address and password. The app stores this information for you protecting your photos with your credentials. There is a checkbox to prepopulate your password each time you login. You must set this each login.


Email: Enter your email here.
 Password: Enter your password here.
 Login Button: Logs in.
 Save Password: Password field saves for next login.
Your API key has been set.

Welcome to the dashboard. On this page you will see information about your current app. It shows how many images you have stored, when you last logged in, and your API key. The API key can be edited by entering a new one. If you leave the key blank, it will default to the school key. After you click on the \'SET Key\' button, it will set your new key. You can navigate away with the navigation drawer menu.\n
\nAPI key field: Enter key here.
Your Date is in The Future

Welcome to the search page. This page allows you to search for a new daily image. You simple need to click on the \'Search Image\' button and a calendar will appear. Choose the date you would like to select, and click ok. The page will automatically download the appropriate image for the date selected. If you select a date in the future, before they began image of the day, or a date where there is a video instead of an image, it will give you an error message. Once the information has been displayed, you can select the \'Save Image\' button to save, the \'Search Image\' button to select a new date, click on the HDURL to open the browser and see new image, or you can navigate away with the navigation drawer menu.

Welcome to the stored images page. On this page, you will be able to view all your saved images in a list. The photo is displayed with the title underneath. If you click on the photo, it will open a new window or frame if you are using a tablet, and display the image with its title, date, explanation, regular URL, and the HDURL. If you click on the HDURL it will take you to your browser and load the HD image. Simply click your back arrow if you want to close the new window and return to your list. If you push and hold the photo in the list, it will give you an option to delete the photo from your app. You can navigate away with the navigation drawer menu.
